page.title: 15Southend:Local papers
page.content: In Southend there is one daily local paper and two free weekly ones.The daily paper is called The {Evening Echo}and is produced from Monday to Saturday of each week.The two weekly newspapers,{The Standard {Recorder}and the{Yellow Advertiser}are mainly advertising papers. 63,000 copies of the Evening Echo are produced each day,made from paper that would stretch 6 miles.The papers carry local as well as national news and sports information about the local football team "Southend United" and all the local leagues for sports such as swimming,darts and cricket. The Evening Echo costs 16p and is available in the late afternoon.The Standard Recorder and the Yellow Advertiser are delivered free to every household on Wednesday or Thursday.
